It has been close a month since my experience with Sanctuary Pet Cremation, and while I'm still recovering from my grieve, I'd still want to take the chance to thank the team for being so respectful and professional in the way the whole process as handled.
From the very beginning of arranging for a vet to my place, to the collection and subsequently the cremation process, everything has been very well handled and there has never been any pressure or rush from the team which I was really surprised.
Hence I feel that they deserve this review based on the end to end experience I had with them.
I'd highly recommend them if anyone is looking for a wonderful team who can help with the rainbow journey for your beloved pet
